extendedInfo.description: Use your phone's GPS to track your runs when you ski or snowboard. Find your friends while you're on the mountain and playback your day seeing the run names and their difficulty. Our charts show your steeps, speed, and run difficulty. Share your adventure with your Fresheez Friends and on Facebook, Twitter, and soon Google+. Besides skiing and riding, Fresheez is great for hiking, biking, running, golf, sailing, horseback riding... anything outdoorsy.Best of all is Fresheez SnowQuest: Compete with your friends just by skiing and riding, on day out and over the entire season! Play Top Dog (difficulty of runs), Scorched Snow (top sustained speeds), Slacker (last one down the mountain wins!) and The Long Slog (distance). With SnowQuest you also get a trophy case for your achievements on the mountain. SnowQuest: the game is real.Fresheez supports resorts in the US and Canada, as well as around the world. See Fresheez.com for the complete list, but here's a partial list of resorts we support in the US and Canada:CA:Heavenly, Northstar, Kirkwood, Squaw, Sierra-at-Tahoe, Mammoth, June, Alpine Meadows, Sugar Bowl, Homewood, Boreal, China Peak, Bear Valley, Snow Summit, Mountain High...CO:Vail, Breckenridge, Keystone, Copper, Winter Park, Steamboat, Beaver Creek, Arapahoe Basin, Snowmass, Aspen, Crested Butte, Telluride, Wolf Creek...UT: Snowbird, Alta, The Canyonds, Park City, Solitude, Deer Valley, Brighton...ID: Sun Valley, Bogus Basin, Schweitzer...MT: Big Sky, Moonlight, Whitefish, Bridger Bowl...OR:Mt Hood Meadows, Timberline, Mt Bachelor...WA:Crystal Mountain, Stevens Pass, Snoqualmie, Mt Spokane, Mt Baker...NM:Taos, Angel Fire, Sandia, Apache, Pajarito...WY: Jackson, Targhee, Snow King, Sleeping Giant...NV & AZ:Diamond Peak, Mt Rose, Las Vegas, Arizona Snow Bowl...VT:Killington, Stowe, Stratton, Sugarbush, Mount Snow, Smugglers, Okemo, Jay Peak, Mad River Glen...ME: Sunday River, Sugarloaf, Saddleback Ski Area, Shawnee Peak...NH: Gunstock, Loon Mountain, Bretton Woods, Cannon Mountain, Waterville, Mount Sunapee, Attitash...NY: Holiday Valley, Hunter, Bristol Mountain, Peek'n Peak, Windham, Gore, Lake Placid, Belleayre, Holimont...MA:Wachusett Mountain, Jiminy Peak, Butternut...PA:Seven Springs, Liberty Mountain, Blue Mountain, Jack Frost, Camelback, Whitetail, Sno Mountain, Roundtop, Hidden Valley...VA, WV, NC:Wintergreen, Massanutten, Snowshoe, Timberline Four Seasons, Winterplace, Sugar Mountain, Cataloochee, Appalachian, Beech...Midwest: Boyne, Crystal Mountain, Welch Village, Spirit Mountain, Afton Alps, Sunburst, Alpine Valley, Cascade Mountain, Wilmot, Granite Peak, Devil's Head, Boston Mills, BrandywineCanada:BC: Whistler/Blackcomb, Big White, Fernie, Red Mountain, Sun Peaks, Revelstoke, Kimberley...AB: Lake Louise, Sunshine Village, Nakiska...ON & QC: Blue Mountain, Searchmount, Mont Tremblant, Bromont, Mont-Sainte-AnneAnd many, many, many more.

reviews.title: Awesome App!
reviews.comment: Best App I have. Keeps track of runs and the trails you took. Best tech support I\'ve ever dealt with.
reviews.author: Sean Boshart

reviews.title: Lots of fun for a day out on the mountain
reviews.comment: Tried this app free with a promo and would definitely buy it. It is a pretty accurate way to document your day on the slopes and compete with friends. Also helpful for finding friends!
reviews.author: Kyna Zacharias

reviews.title: Good product but fat price ruins it
reviews.comment: Good graphics and stats. The game aspect I could do without but doesn\'t get in the way. The ongoing billing does.   Not worth it.
reviews.author: Dave Raiman

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Won\'t even start up. Just sits there, saying \"loading\", for 10 minutes.  Galaxy S II
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fresheez won\'t load
reviews.comment: Good idea but wouldn\'t function pass a load screen when trying to log in. Good idea though.
reviews.author: david cruz
